thread.title: Man-Cave | Women's porn viewing habits revealed in new study
thread.title_full: Man-Cave | Women's porn viewing habits revealed in new study - entertainment.ie

author: Jason Brennan
title: Man-Cave | Women's porn viewing habits revealed in new study
text:
Research carried out for Marie Claire magazine has indicated that one in three women watch porn at least once a week.
The survey took in data from 3,000 women, 70% of whom were aged between 18 and 34. More than half of them were in a relationship.
Of the women surveyed, 90% of them saying they watch porn online, with two-thirds saying they watch it on their smartphone. 31% said they watch porn at least once a week, and a further 30% said they watch it a few of times a month.
When asked what type of porn they viewed, they responded as follows?
63% Heterosexual
44% Lesbian
31% It's a mixed bag
28% Hard-core
26% Soft-core/"arty"
13% Gay male
13% Not listed here
Independent.co.uk
